name: Content Creation Automation
description: Automated content creation using Manus AI

steps.manus_prompt: Research and analyze trending topics in Power BI and business intelligence. Identify content gaps and opportunities.
Create detailed content outline for [TOPIC] targeting [AUDIENCE] with [GOAL]. Include SEO keywords and structure.
steps.expected_output: Detailed content outline with SEO optimization

steps.manus_prompt: Write comprehensive [CONTENT_TYPE] based on outline. Ensure engaging, informative, and SEO-optimized content.
steps.expected_output: Complete content draft ready for review

steps.manus_prompt: Optimize content for SEO, readability, and engagement. Add meta descriptions, headers, and call-to-actions.
Create distribution strategy for content across multiple channels. Include social media, email, and partnership opportunities.
